column4: Okay, I have a bit of a problem. I'm connected to my wireless network, and my wired network keeps coming alive and kills my connection, because I have nothing wired. Any help?
i would never dual-boot. virtualbox's seamless mode is lovely.
youre better of making a 10GB partition with m$ XP for games or try it in wine, cedega, crossover
nah, i just play q3a, and its native, so im good
